lead_paragraph: The artist’s austere objects at Petzel Gallery include paintings of urban tunnels, a security checkpoint installation and graphite sculptures evoking supercomputers.

headline.print_headline: Review: Adam McEwen’s ‘Harvest’ Explores the Movement of People, Vehicles and Information
headline.main: Review: Adam McEwen’s ‘Harvest’ Explores the Movement of People, Vehicles and Information

snippet: The artist’s austere objects at Petzel Gallery include paintings of urban tunnels, a security checkpoint installation and graphite sculptures evoking supercomputers.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews exhibit Harvest by Adam McEwen at Pretzel Gallery.
